reviews.content: Can’t see how much does photos takes because some variable from iOS 12 writes on screen. Need to fix this

It's showing some additional text on the top but it also shows the size of the photo.
Unfortunately, it's now always visible because of the additional text.

doesn’t work at all. 
11 Pro Max iOS 13.5

It shows the size however it doesn't display 1 item selected but ALBUM_OTHER (1) Size: xyx
partially works on ios 13.5 iphone 7
Works but the size is hard to see. It is covered by a long label/string, but If you enter landscape mode you will be able to see the size though.
